rows.label: qev027101_MSG0001
rows.name:
I would greatly appreciate your patience while I explain
my plight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0002
rows.name:
I understand this is sudden, and any hesitance on your
part is natural. Casual small talk to ease tension
and build rapport has never been my strongest suit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0003
rows.name:
New LA's provisional government is poised to accept
a representative for the city's xenoform residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Oversight for the election of this individual has been
entrusted to the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0005
rows.name:
At present, we have asked the Ma-non and Nopon
populations to put forward a candidate chosen by
internal consensus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0006
rows.name: It is here that things went...awry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0007
rows.name:
The Ma-non took to the political process most eagerly,
and their candidate—a fellow named Adappin—
presently leads the race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0008
rows.name:
However, the policy platform Adappin has proposed is
quite beyond our comprehension.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0009
rows.name:
All food reserves are to be converted to pizza.
Payment for all contracts is to be made in pizza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0010
rows.name:
He has also proposed a "pizza tax" to be levied upon
all pizza-based transactions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0011
rows.name:
My people aspire to broad-minded inclusiveness,
but I'm afraid this platform simply does not reflect
the desires of all New LA's non-human residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yet Adappin is adamant. He's taken his policies for
faits accomplis, and has begun buying up pizza
parlors all over the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0013
rows.name:
The Ovah within me cries out that something must
be done to avert this disaster.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0014
rows.name: Which brings me to my point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0015
rows.name:
It appears that dissuading Adappin at this time will be
quite impossible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0016
rows.name: So we have decided to undermine his campaign.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0017
rows.name:
I understand how this action could seem to violate
the sanctity of the democratic system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0018
rows.name:
However, we also feel that allowing our first elected
official to represent us so poorly is an equally
unacceptable option.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0019
rows.name: I wonder if I might not have your assistance in this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev027101_SEL0011
rows.name: Offer to help sabotage Adappin's campaign.

rows.label: qev027101_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev027101_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask Sun'barac if he has any other ideas
that might not be so...sketchy.

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0020
rows.name: You will? Most excellent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0021
rows.name:
I thank you for your understanding and assistance.
I'm glad to have a human ally in this undertaking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0022
rows.name:
I understand it may not be the most appetizing of jobs,
but I hope you agree it is a necessary evil for
maintaining inter-race relations in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0023
rows.name:
With that firmly in mind, it becomes a simpler task
to weigh our sense of purpose against any feelings of
guilt or remorse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0024
rows.name: Other ideas? Certainly we have considered them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0025
rows.name:
For instance, we thought of using the nature of
Orphean reproduction to multiply until we became an
unbreakable voting bloc.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0026
rows.name:
But heedlessly increasing our numbers presents a
host of problems that my race would very much prefer
to avoid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0027
rows.name:
In this case, forcing the Ma-non to stand down is in
the best interests of all races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0028
rows.name: We plan to depose Adappin using drugs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Please do not mistake our intentions—we aren't about
to poison anyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0030
rows.name:
The drug in question is a traditional Orphean
compound that dulls judgment and makes the
subject adopt an extremely positive outlook.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0031
rows.name: Put simply, it makes them agree to literally anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0032
rows.name:
And who would trust a politician willing to say "yes" to
anyone and anything?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0033
rows.name:
Though I frankly question the sense of anyone who
trusts a politician proposing something called a
"pizza tax." ...But I digress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0034
rows.name:
As an example of our plan, we might propose that
the pizza tax be banned forever, at which point he
would voice immediate support.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0035
rows.name:
He would lose all of his erstwhile supporters,
and his campaign would be dead in the water.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0036
rows.name: That is the sort of scenario we envision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0037
rows.name:
You can assist us by gathering the ingredients
required to make this compound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0038
rows.name:
The two ingredients we currently lack are one
sibercaseras mushroom and five sturdy drakebones.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0039
rows.name:
I would ask you to gather those ingredients and
return here to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0040
rows.name:
I do not think it an overstatement to say that this
mission has major ramifications for all Mira's citizens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0041
rows.name:
Let us bend the path ahead toward a better future
for all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0042
rows.name:
The Ma-non camp is a frenzy of activity—I must
concede that this Adappin has devoted fans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0043
rows.name: We cannot be slack in our response.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0044
rows.name:
Please bring a sibercaseras mushroom and five
sturdy drakebones to me as quickly as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0045
rows.name:
Always a pleasure to see you.
Have you made progress?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0046
rows.name: Perfect. These are indeed the ingredients we need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0047
rows.name:
We shall begin crafting that compound
immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0048
rows.name: The process is short. I shall return in but a moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0049
rows.name:
Thank you for your patience.
The drug is complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0050
rows.name: Now all that remains is to have Adappin ingest it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Thankfully, it is tasteless and odorless by nature,
so slipping it into his food seems the most sensible
method.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0052
rows.name:
Though breaking into a man's home presents its own
share of difficulties. Not to mention the scandal if such
an effort were discovered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0053
rows.name:
I think it would be extremely helpful to have a grasp
of the man's daily habits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0054
rows.name:
We could observe him to see if a convenient
opening exists. A habit of eating out, et cetera.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0055
rows.name:
If I could impose upon you the task of determining
the best timing and method to introduce the drug
to his food, I would be most grateful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0056
rows.name:
Fail, and we all face a tyrannical age of pizza the
likes of which sentient life has never known.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0057
rows.name:
The future of civil society hangs in the balance.
Please accept this noble mission![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0058
rows.name:
We cannot allow New LA to become a puppet state
of Big Pizza![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0059
rows.name:
Please, you must find a way to sneak our drug
into Adappin's food.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0060
rows.name: Excellent. Then he has consumed the drug?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0061
rows.name:
I look forward to his next campaign speech with
great anticipation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev027101_MSG0062
rows.name:
It should be starting shortly in the commercial
district's fountain plaza. Will you go bear witness?[ST:wait ]
